taskbody.prereq: These steps assume that you already have a main dataset (based on domain entity in the example) containing a mapped attribute pointing to the foreign entity (currency) with a linked dataset.
taskbody.context:
This task explains how to display data in a drop-down list, using the widget combo box.
The use case described here regards data retrieved from foreign entities: for instance, presenting a list of currencies from the domain context.

step.cmd: Create a fragment based on the linked dataset.
In this fragment, select the combo box from the palette and drop it in the editor.
In the Properties view, set the domain entity to the relevant attribute; for example, the code of the currency.
Make sure the expected annotation is set on the selected attribute.
In the fragment or module based on the main dataset, drop the association into the form; for example, association to a currency.
Make sure the expected annotation is set on the association.
If the fragment is not the default one for the linked dataset, change the fragment location from the Properties view.
